altername_name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Hoshimitou Kanashimi no Fukushuuki
name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Hoshimitou Kanashimi no Hukushuuki
overview: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Hoshimitou Kanashimi no Hukushuuki (金田一少年の事件簿 ～星見島 悲しみの復讐鬼～) is an adventure game developed and published by Hudson Soft for the Sega Saturn. It is based on the 1997 Kindaichi Case Files anime series.
